TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1236-1237
TEI.2.document_title: M. Wilkinson to Stephen F. Austin, 11-29-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Introducing John Mathews, the "numeriousness" of whose family takes him to Texas.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1236-1237

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Introducing John Mathews, the "numeriousness" of whose family takes him to Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*State of Missouri Maddison County*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Fredk Town*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="11-29-1825">Nov 29th 25*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*bearer */person_mentioned*of this letter *person_mentioned*Mr. Jno Mathews*/person_mentioned* is an *person_mentioned*old and reputable emegrant to this *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* */person_mentioned*previous to its cession to the *location_mentioned*United States*/location_mentioned* and has ever since conducted himself in the most upright and gentlemanly manner, he owns in this *location_mentioned*neighbourhood*/location_mentioned* a large and valuable, *location_mentioned*farm */location_mentioned*but from the numeriousness of his *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*he in his old age visits your *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* with a view if he likes to become a citizen; permit me to introduce and recommend him to you as a useful and valuable citizen and any aid and assistance you can render him whilst in the *location_mentioned*Spanish provinces*/location_mentioned* will confer an Obligation on*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*M Wilkinson*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* Province *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr Mathews*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
